00019 using std::max;
00020 using std::min;
00021 
00022 //[ms]
00023 static const double DMA_PERIOD = (1.0/(28.64e3/2));
00024 
00025 double XSHPulser::resolution() const {
00026     return DMA_PERIOD;
00027 }
00028 
00029 //[ms]
00030 static const double MIN_MTU_LEN = 50e-3;
00031 //[ms]
00032 static const double MTU_PERIOD = (1.0/(28.64e3/1));
00033 
00034 
00035 static const unsigned int NUM_BANK = 2;
00036 static const unsigned int PATTERNS_ZIPPED_MAX = 40000;
00037 
00038 //dma time commands
00039 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_END = 0;
00040 //+1: a phase by 90deg.
00041 //+2,3: from DMA start 
00042 //+4,5: src neg. offset from here
00043 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_COPY_HBURST = 1;
00044 //+1,2: time to appear
00045 //+2,3: pattern to appear
00046 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_LSET_LONG = 2;
00047 //+0: time to appear + START
00048 //+1,2: pattern to appear
00049 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_LSET_START = 0x10;
00050 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_LSET_END = 0xffu;
00051 
00052 //off-dma time commands
00053 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_END = 0;
00054 //+1,2 : TimerL
00055 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_WAIT = 1;
00056 //+1,2 : TimerL
00057 //+3,4: LSW of TimerU
00058 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_WAIT_LONG = 2;
00059 //+1,2 : TimerL
00060 //+3,4: MSW of TimerU
00061 //+5,6: LSW of TimerU
00062 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_WAIT_LONG_LONG = 3;
00063 //+1: byte
00064 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_AUX1 = 4;
00065 //+1: byte
00066 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_AUX3 = 5;
00067 //+1: address
00068 //+2,3: value
00069 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_AUX2_DA = 6;
00070 //+1,2: loops
00071 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DO = 7;
00072 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_LOOP = 8;
00073 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_LOOP_INF = 9;
00074 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_BREAKPOINT = 0xa; 
00075 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_PULSEON = 0xb;
00076 //+1,2: last pattern
00077 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_SET = 0xc;
00078 //+1,2: size
00079 //+2n: patterns
00080 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_HBURST = 0xd;
00081 //+1 (signed char): QAM1 offset
00082 //+2 (signed char): QAM2 offset
00083 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_SET_DA_TUNE_OFFSET = 0xe;
00084 //+1 (signed char): QAM1 level
00085 //+2 (signed char): QAM2 level
00086 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_SET_DA_TUNE_LEVEL = 0xf;
00087 //+1 (signed char): QAM1 delay
00088 //+2 (signed char): QAM2 delay
00089 static const unsigned char PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_SET_DA_TUNE_DELAY = 0x10;
00090 
00091 XSHPulser::XSHPulser(const char *name, bool runtime,
00092                      const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00093                      const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00094                      const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00095                      const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00096     XCharDeviceDriver<XPulser>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00097 {
00098     interface()->setEOS("\n");
00099     interface()->setSerialBaudRate(115200);
00100     interface()->setSerialStopBits(2);
00101 
00102     const int ports[] = {
00103         PORTSEL_GATE, PORTSEL_PREGATE, PORTSEL_TRIG1, PORTSEL_TRIG2,
00104         PORTSEL_GATE3, PORTSEL_COMB, PORTSEL_QSW, PORTSEL_ASW,
00105         PORTSEL_PULSE1, PORTSEL_PULSE2, PORTSEL_COMB_FM, PORTSEL_COMB
00106     };
00107     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < sizeof(ports)/sizeof(int); i++) {
00108         portSel(i)->value(ports[i]);
00109     }
00110 }
00111 
00112 void
00113 XSHPulser::createNativePatterns()
00114 {
00115     //dry-run to determin LastPattern, DMATime
00116     m_dmaTerm = 0;
00117     m_lastPattern = 0;
00118     uint32_t pat = 0;
00119     insertPreamble((unsigned short)pat);
00120     for(RelPatListIterator it = m_relPatList.begin(); it != m_relPatList.end(); it++)
00121     {
00122         pulseAdd(it->toappear, it->pattern, (it == m_relPatList.begin() ), true );
00123         pat = it->pattern;
00124     }
00125   
00126     insertPreamble((unsigned short)pat);
00127 
00128     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX_MASK/PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX; i++) {
00129         const unsigned short word = qamWaveForm(i).size();
00130         if(!word) continue;
00131         m_waveformPos[i] = m_zippedPatterns.size();
00132         m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_HBURST);
00133         m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(word / 0x100) );
00134         m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(word % 0x100) );
00135         for(std::vector<std::complex<double> >::const_iterator it = 
00136                 qamWaveForm(i).begin(); it != qamWaveForm(i).end(); it++) {
00137             double x = max(min(it->real() * 125.0, 124.0), -124.0);
00138             double y = max(min(it->imag() * 125.0, 124.0), -124.0);
00139             m_zippedPatterns.push_back( (unsigned char)(char)x );   
00140             m_zippedPatterns.push_back( (unsigned char)(char)y );   
00141         }
00142     }
00143     
00144     m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DO);
00145     m_zippedPatterns.push_back(0);
00146     m_zippedPatterns.push_back(0);
00147     for(RelPatListIterator it = m_relPatList.begin(); it != m_relPatList.end(); it++)
00148     {
00149         pulseAdd(it->toappear, it->pattern, (it == m_relPatList.begin() ), false );
00150         pat = it->pattern;
00151     }
00152     finishPulse();
00153 
00154     m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_END);
00155 }
00156 
00157 int
00158 XSHPulser::setAUX2DA(double volt, int addr)
00159 {
00160     m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_AUX2_DA);
00161     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char) addr);
00162     volt = max(volt, 0.0);
00163     unsigned short word = (unsigned short)rint(4096u * volt / 2 / 2.5);
00164     word = min(word, (unsigned short)4095u);
00165     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(word / 0x100) );
00166     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(word % 0x100) );
00167     return 0;
00168 }
00169 int
00170 XSHPulser::insertPreamble(unsigned short startpattern)
00171 {
00172     const double masterlevel = pow(10.0, *masterLevel() / 20.0);
00173     const double qamlevel1 = *qamLevel1();
00174     const double qamlevel2 = *qamLevel2();
00175     m_zippedPatterns.clear();
00176     
00177     m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_SET_DA_TUNE_OFFSET);
00178     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(signed char)rint(127.5 * *qamOffset1() *1e-2 / masterlevel ) );
00179     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(signed char)rint(127.5 * *qamOffset2() *1e-2 / masterlevel ) );
00180     m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_SET_DA_TUNE_LEVEL);
00181     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(signed char)rint(qamlevel1 * 0x100) );
00182     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(signed char)rint(qamlevel2 * 0x100) );
00183     m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_SET_DA_TUNE_DELAY);
00184 //obsolete
00185 //  m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(signed char)rint(*qamDelay1() / DMA_PERIOD * 1e-3) );
00186 //  m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(signed char)rint(*qamDelay2() / DMA_PERIOD * 1e-3) );
00187     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(signed char)rint(0) );
00188     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(signed char)rint(0) );
00189     
00190     uint32_t len;   
00191     //wait for 1 ms
00192     len = lrint(1.0 / MTU_PERIOD);
00193     m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_WAIT_LONG);
00194     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)((len % 0x10000) / 0x100) );
00195     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)((len % 0x10000) % 0x100) );
00196     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)((len / 0x10000) / 0x100) );
00197     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)((len / 0x10000) % 0x100) );
00198     m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_SET);
00199     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(startpattern / 0x100) );
00200     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(startpattern % 0x100) );
00201     m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_LSET_START + 2);
00202     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(startpattern / 0x100) );
00203     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(startpattern % 0x100) );
00204     m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_END);
00205     
00206     m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_PULSEON);
00207     
00208     //wait for 10 ms
00209     len = lrint(10.0 / MTU_PERIOD);
00210     m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_WAIT_LONG);
00211     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)((len % 0x10000) / 0x100) );
00212     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)((len % 0x10000) % 0x100) );
00213     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)((len / 0x10000) / 0x100) );
00214     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)((len / 0x10000) % 0x100) );
00215     
00216 /*  m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_AUX1);
00217     int aswfilter = 3;
00218     if(aswFilter()->to_str() == ASW_FILTER_1) aswfilter = 1;
00219     if(aswFilter()->to_str() == ASW_FILTER_2) aswfilter = 2;
00220     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)aswfilter);
00221 */
00222     m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_AUX1);
00223     m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)3);
00224 /*  setAUX2DA(*portLevel8(), 1);
00225     setAUX2DA(*portLevel9(), 2);
00226     setAUX2DA(*portLevel10(), 3);
00227     setAUX2DA(*portLevel11(), 4);
00228     setAUX2DA(*portLevel12(), 5);
00229     setAUX2DA(*portLevel13(), 6);
00230     setAUX2DA(*portLevel14(), 7);*/
00231     setAUX2DA(0.0, 1);
00232     setAUX2DA(0.0, 2);
00233     setAUX2DA(0.0, 3);
00234     setAUX2DA(0.0, 4);
00235     setAUX2DA(0.0, 5);
00236     setAUX2DA(0.0, 6);
00237     setAUX2DA(0.0, 7);
00238     setAUX2DA(1.6 * masterlevel, 0); //tobe 5V
00239     
00240     return 0;   
00241 }
00242 int
00243 XSHPulser::finishPulse(void)
00244 {
00245     m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_END);
00246     m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_LOOP_INF);
00247     return 0;
00248 }
00249 int
00250 XSHPulser::pulseAdd(uint64_t term, uint32_t pattern, bool firsttime, bool dryrun)
00251 {
00252     const double msec = term * resolution();
00253     int64_t mtu_term = term * llrint(resolution() / MTU_PERIOD);
00254     if( (msec > MIN_MTU_LEN) && ((m_lastPattern & PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX_MASK)/PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX == 0) ) {
00255         //insert long wait
00256         if(!firsttime) {
00257             m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_END);
00258         }
00259         mtu_term += m_dmaTerm;
00260         uint32_t ulen = (uint32_t)(mtu_term / 0x10000uLL);
00261         unsigned short ulenh = (unsigned short)(ulen / 0x10000uL);
00262         unsigned short ulenl = (unsigned short)(ulen % 0x10000uL);  
00263         unsigned short dlen = (uint32_t)(mtu_term % 0x10000uLL);
00264         if(ulenh) {
00265             m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_WAIT_LONG_LONG);
00266             m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(dlen / 0x100) );
00267             m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(dlen % 0x100) );
00268             m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(ulenh / 0x100) );
00269             m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(ulenh % 0x100) );
00270             m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(ulenl / 0x100) );
00271             m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(ulenl % 0x100) );
00272         }
00273         else { if(ulenl) {
00274             m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_WAIT_LONG);
00275             m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(dlen / 0x100) );
00276             m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(dlen % 0x100) );
00277             m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(ulenl / 0x100) );
00278             m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(ulenl % 0x100) );
00279         }
00280         else {
00281             m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_WAIT);
00282             m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(dlen / 0x100) );
00283             m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(dlen % 0x100) );
00284         }
00285         }
00286         mtu_term -= ulen*0x10000uL + dlen;
00287         mtu_term = max(0LL, mtu_term);
00288         m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_SET);
00289         m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(m_lastPattern / 0x100) );
00290         m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(m_lastPattern % 0x100) );
00291         m_dmaTerm = 0;
00292     }
00293     m_dmaTerm += mtu_term;
00294     unsigned long pos_l = m_dmaTerm / llrint(resolution() / MTU_PERIOD);
00295     if(pos_l >= 0x7000u)
00296         throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("Too long DMA."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00297     unsigned short pos = (unsigned short)pos_l;
00298     unsigned short len = mtu_term / llrint(resolution() / MTU_PERIOD);
00299     if( ((m_lastPattern & PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX_MASK)/PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX == 0) && ((pattern & PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX_MASK)/PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX > 0) ) {
00300         unsigned short qam_pos = m_waveformPos[(pattern & PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX_MASK)/PAT_QAM_PULSE_IDX - 1];
00301         if(!dryrun) {
00302             if(!qam_pos || (m_zippedPatterns[qam_pos] != PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_HBURST))
00303                 throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("No waveform."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00304             unsigned short word = m_zippedPatterns.size() - qam_pos;
00305             m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_COPY_HBURST);
00306             m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)((pattern & PAT_QAM_PHASE_MASK)/PAT_QAM_PHASE));
00307             m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(pos / 0x100) );
00308             m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(pos % 0x100) );
00309             m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(word / 0x100) );
00310             m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(word % 0x100) );
00311         }
00312     }
00313     if(len > PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_LSET_END - PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_LSET_START) {
00314         m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_LSET_LONG);
00315         m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(len / 0x100) );
00316         m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(len % 0x100) );
00317         m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(pattern / 0x100) );
00318         m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(pattern % 0x100) );
00319     }
00320     else {
00321         m_zippedPatterns.push_back(PATTERN_ZIPPED_COMMAND_DMA_LSET_START + (unsigned char)len);
00322         m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(pattern / 0x100) );
00323         m_zippedPatterns.push_back((unsigned char)(pattern % 0x100) );
00324     }
00325     m_lastPattern = pattern;
00326     return 0;
00327 }
00328 
00329 void
00330 XSHPulser::changeOutput(bool output, unsigned int /*blankpattern*/)
00331 {
00332     if(output)
00333     {
00334         if(m_zippedPatterns.empty() )
00335             throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("Pulser Invalid pattern"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00336         for(unsigned int retry = 0; ; retry++) {
00337             try {
00338                 interface()->write("!", 1); //poff
00339                 interface()->receive();
00340                 char buf[3];
00341                 if((interface()->scanf("Pulse %3s", buf) != 1) || strncmp(buf, "Off", 3))
00342                     throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00343                 unsigned int size = m_zippedPatterns.size();
00344                 interface()->sendf("$pload %x", size );
00345                 interface()->receive();
00346                 interface()->write(">", 1);
00347                 unsigned short sum = 0;
00348                 for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_zippedPatterns.size(); i++) {
00349                     sum += m_zippedPatterns[i];
00350                 } 
00351                 msecsleep(1);
00352                 interface()->write((char*)&m_zippedPatterns[0], size);
00353           
00354                 interface()->receive();
00355                 unsigned int ret;
00356                 if(interface()->scanf("%x", &ret) != 1)
00357                     throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00358                 if(ret != sum)
00359                     throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("Pulser Check Sum Error"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00360                 interface()->send("$pon");
00361                 interface()->receive();
00362                 if((interface()->scanf("Pulse %2s", buf) != 1) || strncmp(buf, "On", 2))
00363                     throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00364             }
00365             catch (XKameError &e) {
00366                 if(retry > 1) throw e;
00367                 e.print(getLabel() + ": " + KAME::i18n("try to continue") + ", ");
00368                 continue;
00369             }
00370             break;
00371         }
00372     }
00373     else
00374     {
00375         interface()->write("!", 1); //poff
00376         interface()->receive();
00377     }
00378     return;
00379 }
